mapper.update: UPDATE DB_ALLPET.T_HOSPITAL_MORE_INFO SET S_DISPLAY_TEL = #{display_tel}, S_TEL = #{tel} WHERE S_SID = #{sid}
UPDATE DB_ALLPET.T_HOSPITAL_MORE_INFO SET S_INTRODUCE = #{introduce}, S_KEYWORD = #{keyword}, S_REPRESENT_STAFF = #{represent_staff} WHERE S_SID = #{sid}
UPDATE DB_ALLPET.T_HOSPITAL_MORE_INFO SET S_PARKING_INFO = #{parking_info}, S_CREDIT_INFO = #{credit_info} WHERE S_SID = #{sid}

UPDATE DB_ALLPET.T_HOSPITAL_ADDRESS SET S_OLD_ADDR_SIDO = #{old_addr_sido}, S_OLD_ADDR_SIGUNGU = #{old_addr_sigungu}, S_OLD_ADDR_DONG = #{old_addr_dong}, S_OLD_ADDR_ETC = #{old_addr_etc}, S_OLD_ZIPCODE = #{old_zipcode}, N_LATITUDE = #{n_latitude}, N_LONGITUDE = #{n_longitude} WHERE S_SID = #{sid}

UPDATE DB_ALLPET.T_HOSPITAL_BASIC_INFO SET
S_PRESIDENT = #{president},
S_CORP_REG_NUMBER = #{corp_reg_number},
S_COMPANY_NAME = #{company_name},
S_SID = S_SID WHERE S_SID = #{sid}
UPDATE DB_ALLPET.T_HOSPITAL_MORE_INFO SET S_FAX = #{fax}, S_EMAIL = #{email} WHERE S_SID = #{sid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DB_ALLPET.T_HOSPITAL_SITE ( S_SID, N_INDEX, S_TYPE, S_URL, S_STATUS ) VALUES ${value}
INSERT INTO DB_ALLPET.T_HOSPITAL_WORKING_TIME ( S_SID, N_INDEX, S_NAME, S_START_TIME, S_END_TIME, S_ALLTIME, S_DAYOFF, S_COMMENT ) VALUES ${value}
mapper.select: SELECT BI.s_president, BI.s_corp_reg_number, BI.s_company_name, MI.s_display_tel, MI.s_tel, MI.s_email, MI.s_fax FROM DB_ALLPET.T_HOSPITAL_BASIC_INFO BI, DB_ALLPET.T_HOSPITAL_MORE_INFO MI WHERE BI.S_SID = MI.S_SID AND BI.S_SID = #{value}
